title: [Twisted Trail]
description: The trail is little more than a game path winding through the rugged mountains, although no animal tracks are visible in the hard-packed dirt.  The silence is oppressive, weighing down upon you and making you strain your ears in hopes of catching any sound, even one you might not want to hear.  A small trail meets this one from the mountain to the west, cutting a precarious way across the slope.

The trail is little more than a game path winding through the rugged mountains, although no animal tracks are visible in the faint moonlight.  The silence is oppressive, weighing down upon you and making you strain your ears in hopes of catching any sound, even one you might not want to hear.  A small trail meets this one from the mountain to the west, cutting a precarious way across the slope.
